user_description: You are a %{age} year-old %{gender}, with %{diagnosis} diagnosis
no_demographics: You did not enter your demographic information. Click on pencil icon to add the information

cookie.acceptance_message: This website uses cookies to provide you a rich user experience. By continuing to use this website you are giving consent to cookies being used.

landing.about_content_explanation: If you have a smart phone or a computer you have the power to help save lives in your community.
landing.about_data_collection: Make a difference by answering one or two questions at least once a day (while at home, when at work, or out and about) to indicate how youâ€™re feeling and where you are at that moment. This simple sharing of information will help the understanding and control of COVID-19.
landing.about_current_participant_count: To date, %{participantCount} people in Illinois have used COVIDstoplight to report their symptoms.
landing.participation_info: Simple: just click the button below labeled
landing.info_disclaimer: We do not ask questions that could lead to you being recognized. We value your privacy and anonymity.
landing.how_will_my_data_be_used: How will this information be used?
landing.data_use_explanation: The data from everyone using COVIDstoplight will be combined and the aggregated results used to inform models of disease spread. The aggregated results will be made available to members of the Pandemic Response Commons Consortium.
landing.about_fevermap: This app derives from the excellent work of the Fevermap team.

entry.first_entry_disclaimer: Entries are submitted into the database based on your device. We would appreciate that you submitted your information from the same device every time. This will allow us to monitor your fever status better.
entry.submission_period_disclaimer: To prevent unnecessary data, submissions are restricted to once every 12 hours.
entry.first_time_disclaimer: As this is your first time using COVIDstoplight, we will ask you a few questions.
entry.these_questions_wont_be_repeated: These questions won't be repeated on future submissions.

questions.how_are_feeling: Making a difference is as easy as 1-2-3.
questions.how_are_feeling_bullets: Indicate below if you feel healthy now, or if you're not feeling well::If not feeling well, indicate what symptoms you are experiencing::Indicate where you are by entering your zip code
questions.other_symptoms: Are you experiencing any of the following?
questions.loss_of_taste: New loss of taste or smell
questions.positive_covid_diagnosis: I have a positive diagnosis of COVID-19.
questions.gender_in_passport: Gender as stated in your passport or other government records
questions.location_determination_subtitle: Location is determined using location API. Make sure to allow location sensors.
questions.location_change_subtitle: Enter your location in the zip code field or press the button below.
questions.use_gps: Get my location from my device

entry.no_previous_submissions: You will see your submission history here.
entry.last_submission_was_done: You last submission was made at %{date}
entry.submission_count_text: You have entered you fever information
entry.currently_holding_a_streak_of: Your current consecutive days streak is:

history.title: History
history.no_achievements_message: You can earn badges for reporting continuously.

stats.description: Darker areas have more reports of people feeling unwell

success.offline_entry_queued: Seems like you are offline. Entry has been queued.
success.entry_send_failed_queued: Submission failed. Entry has been queued.

error.age_not_in_range: Given birth year is not in the allowed range (1900 - 2020).
error.fever_temp_value_invalid: The fever temperature value is not valid.
error.location_data_invalid: The given location data is invalid.
error.api_data_invalid: Data sent to the API was invalid.
error.do_not_submit_new_temp_until: Do not submit a new temperature until %{dateTime}

pwa_installer.title: Install COVIDstoplight
pwa_installer.content: COVIDstoplight can be installed as a Progressive Web Application. If installed, we can provide you with great extra features like faster runtime and push notifications (coming soon).

notifications.title: Allow notifications
notifications.content: COVIDstoplight would like to offer you a daily notification reminding you to log your daily health status. Allow notifications?

location.title: Allow Location Access
location.content: Can we use location information from phone/browser or would you prefer to enter location with each report?

social.quote: I just contributed to greater good
